get.description:
This endpoint allows you to search for companies based on a country code and a query string.

The search can be performed using either a company legal name, commercial name, historical name, or registration number. Capabilities vary by country. 

The results include basic company information such as name, address, and the id of the company. You can pass this id to the getCompany endpoint to retrieve more detailed information about the company.

Depending on the country, the speed might vary, from sub-second results, up to 10 seconds.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country code, which can be an ISO country code, or for the United States, a combination of "US" and the state code (e.g., "US-CA" for California).

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query, which can be a company name or registration number. Note that search capabilities may vary by country, with some supporting only name or registration number searches.

post.description:
This endpoint allows you to retrieve detailed information about a specific company.

You can either:
1. Make a new request by providing:
   - country code
   - company id
   - desired data points
   - optional document IDs

2. Get results from a previous request by providing:
   - requestId (this will return cached data and avoid being billed again)

Available data points are:
- companyProfile: Basic company information, legal representatives and shareholders
- ultimateBeneficialOwners: Information about beneficial owners
- availableDocuments: List of available official documents

There are two ways to retrieve documents:

1. Two-step process:
   - First, request the "availableDocuments" data point to get a list of all available documents with their IDs
   - Then, use these specific document IDs in a second request

2. Direct access using smart IDs:
   - Use predefined smart IDs for quick access to common documents:
     - trade_register_extract: Latest trade register extract
     - certified_trade_register_extract: Latest certified trade register extract
     - last_fiscal_year_financial_statement: Latest financial statement
     - last_consolidated_article_of_association: Latest consolidated articles of association

Refer to our country coverage documentation to check which smart IDs are available for each country.

This endpoint allows you to retrieve the pricing information for a specific country.

The response includes:
- Base price for company searches
- Pricing for different data points (company profile, UBO, etc.)
- Document retrieval costs
- Any country-specific pricing variations

This can be useful for:
- Understanding costs before making requests
- Budgeting and planning purposes
- Displaying pricing information to end users

Note: Prices are returned in euros (EUR) and may vary based on your subscription plan.

countryCode.description: Country of the address using ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

address.description: The legal address of the company

companyNumber.description: The company number. In some countries, this might be a concatenation of the registry and city (e.g., in Germany: "Augsburg HRB 34617"). The search function will always return a usable company number. Check the documentation to see which number format is used for each country.

legalNameInEnglish.example: Test Display Hong Kong Trading Limited
legalNameInEnglish.description: The English translation or romanization of the legal name, commonly used for international business. Particularly relevant for companies registered with non-Latin alphabet names (e.g., Chinese, Japanese, Korean, etc.).

country.description: Country code, which can be an ISO country code, or for the United States, a combination of "US" and the state code (e.g., "US-CA" for California).

id.description: The company id. In some countries, this might be a concatenation of the registry and city (e.g., in Germany: "Augsburg HRB 34617"). The search function will always return a usable company number. Check the documentation to see which number format is used for each country.

countryCode.description: Country code, which can be an ISO country code, or for the United States, a combination of "US" and the state code (e.g., "US-CA" for California).

dataPoints.description: The data points to retrieve. Available data points are companyProfile, ultimateBeneficialOwners, availableDocuments, or establishments.

documents.description:
There are two ways to retrieve documents:

1. Two-step process:
   - First, request the "availableDocuments" data point to get a list of all available documents with their IDs
   - Then, use these specific document IDs in a second request

2. Direct access using smart IDs:
   - Use predefined smart IDs for quick access to common documents:
     - trade_register_extract: Latest trade register extract
     - certified_trade_register_extract: Latest certified trade register extract
     - last_fiscal_year_financial_statement: Latest financial statement
     - last_consolidated_article_of_association: Latest consolidated articles of association

Refer to our country coverage documentation to check which smart IDs are available for each country.

requestId.description: Optional UUID that references a previous request. When provided, returns cached data from that specific request instead of fetching fresh data.

status.description: The standardized status of the company

closureReason.description: The reason for company closure, if applicable

closureDate.description: The date when the company was closed, if applicable

insolvencyStartDate.description: The date when insolvency proceedings started, if applicable

additionalInfo.example: Company entered voluntary liquidation due to retirement of owner

localName.description: The local status of the company in the local language

active.description: Indicates if the company is active. DEPRECATED: Use statusDetailsBeta instead

statusDetailsBeta.description: Detailed status information including closure reasons and dates

LegalFormEnum.description: The standardized legal form of the company.

localName.example: EURL, entreprise unipersonnelle à responsabilité limitée
localName.description: The local legal form of the company, in the local language

englishTranslation.description: The English translation of the local legal form.

semaphoreStandard.description: The standardized legal form of the company.

iso20275Code.description: The ISO 20275 Entity Legal Form code for the company.

currency.description: The ISO 4217 currency code (e.g., EUR, USD).

formatted.description: Formatted string representation of the monetary amount in the local format

exact.description: The exact number of employees, if known

min.description: The minimum number of employees in a range

max.description: The maximum number of employees in a range

lastUpdated.description: The date when the employee count was last updated

isEstimate.description: Indicates if the employee count is an estimate

id.description: The id of the company, see documentation.

countryCode.description: The  ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the company registration country

identifiers.description: A dictionary of different identifiers for the company

legalName.description: The legal name of the company.

legalNameInEnglish.example: Test Display Hong Kong Trading Limited
legalNameInEnglish.description: The English translation or romanization of the legal name, commonly used for international business. Particularly relevant for companies registered with non-Latin alphabet names (e.g., Chinese, Japanese, Korean, etc.).

commercialNames.description: An array of commercial names or trading names used by the company.

status.description: The status of the company, including local status and whether it is active.

registrationDate.description: The registration date of the company.

legalForm.description: The legal form of the company, including local and standard forms.

capital.description: The share capital of the company.

ISIC.description: Computer programming, consultancy and related activities

activityDescription.description: A text description of the company activities
activityDescription.example: Development of software solutions and IT consulting services

phones.description: An array of phone numbers for the company in E.164 format (e.g., +33123456789 for France, +1234567890 for USA).

website.description: The official website URL of the company.

employeeCount.description: The employee count information for the company.

title.description: Title of the person (e.g., Mr., Mrs., Dr.)

suffix.description: Suffix of the name (e.g., Jr., Sr., III)

month.description: Month of birth (1-12), where January is 1

type.description: Type of percentage detail (shares, voting rights)

percentageRange.description: Range of control as a lower and upper bound

nature.description: Indicates whether the control is direct or indirect

types.description: Types of control held by the beneficial owner

description.description: Description of why the person is of significant control
description.example: The person holds more than 50% of the shares in the company.

details.description: Details about the percentage of control

nationality.description: Nationality ISO2 country code of the person

control.description: Details of control held by the beneficial owner

example.description: The person holds more than 50% of the shares in the company.

RoleEnum.description: The standardized role of the individual.

localName.description: The local role name in the local language

semaphoreStandard.description: The standardized role of the individual.

nationality.description: Nationality ISO2 country code of the person

role.description: The role of the legal representative

startDate.description: The start date of the legal representative's role

endDate.description: The end date of the legal representative's role (if applicable)

type.description: The type of the legal representative (individual or company)

individual.description: Details of the individual legal representative

company.description: Details of the company legal representative

type.description: The type of the shareholder (individual or company)

sharePercentage.description: The percentage of shares owned by the shareholder

numberOfShares.description: The absolute number of shares owned by the shareholder

shareNominalPrice.description: The nominal price or face value per share

source.description: Description of how the shareholder was found and from which document
source.example: Found in financial statements (Jahresabschluss 2023) - control relationship indicated by Konzernzugehörigkeit

creationDate.description: The creation date of the establishment

endDate.description: The closing date of the establishment (if applicable)

active.description: Whether the establishment is currently active

OtherKeyPersonRoleEnum.description: The standardized role of the individual.

localName.description: The local role name in the local language

semaphoreStandard.description: The standardized role of the individual.

role.description: The role of the other key person

startDate.description: The start date of the role

endDate.description: The end date of the role (if applicable)

type.description: The type of the other key person (individual or company)

individual.description: Details if the other key person is an individual

company.description: Details if the other key person is a company

description.example: Uncertified trade register extract, provided by the French INPI

name.description: Document name in the original language

id.description: Document ID. This can be either a random ID specific to this document, or a stable quick access ID like "trade_register_extract" or "last_available_financial_statement". Stable IDs enable quick access to specific documents without querying available_documents first. Refer to our country coverage documentation to check which quick access IDs are available for each country.

Document ID. This can be either a random ID specific to this document, or a stable quick access ID like "trade_register_extract" or "last_available_financial_statement". Stable IDs enable quick access to specific documents without querying available_documents first. Refer to our country coverage documentation to check which quick access IDs are available for each country.

url.description: Temporary document download URL with a 15-minute lifetime. If the URL expires, you can request the same document again within 24 hours without being charged.

isAIInferred.description: Indicates whether the activity code comes from an official source or has been inferred by AI

ISIC.description: The ISIC activity codes of the company, as deep as possible

status.description: The status of the data point

jobs_in_progress.description:
List of job IDs currently in progress to retrieve this data point or this document. 
      You can retrieve the data once the job has finished by either listening to webhooks or repeating the same API call. 
      Note that data points remain available for 24 hours after purchase, allowing for multiple retrievals within this timeframe
      Multiple jobs can be required to retrieve a single data points when there is multiple underlying data sources. In this case, you will receive multiple webhooks with more data at each step.

errors.description: List of errors encountered while retrieving this data point or this document
example: The local registry could not be reached. Please retry later.

cost.description: The cost in credits for this data point or document

costMarkup.description: The percentage markup for this data point or document when the final cost is not yet known

additionalProperties.description: The retriveal status of the data point
The retriveal status of the document

requestId.description: The unique identifier for the request.

dataStatus.description: Indicates the status of data points and documents associated with the company. It states if the data has been retrieved, if a job is in progress for asynchronous data, or if a job there was an error.

company.description: The main profile information of the company, including, if available, details such as name, registration number, address, and other core data.

ultimateBeneficialOwners.description: The persons of significant control of the company, including, if available, their name, nationality, and other relevant details.

legalRepresentatives.description: The legal representatives of the company, which can be either individuals or companies.

shareholders.description: The shareholders of the company, which can be either individuals or companies.

establishments.description: The establishments of the company, including physical locations where business activities are conducted.

otherKeyPersons.description: Other key persons associated with the company who do not have legal signing authority, such as board members, auditors, and compliance officers.

country.description: Country code, which can be an ISO country code, or for the United States, a combination of "US" and the state code (e.g., "US-CA" for California).
